general_advisory: Dry weather with mainly clear sky expected. Farmers advised to monitor pest activity, apply irrigation, and implement disease management practices as needed.

advisory: In transplanted paddy, control grasses, sedges, and broadleaf weeds by spraying recommended pesticides.
Manage Bud Necrosis disease by spraying Neem-based pesticide or chemical insecticides.
Manage Sett Rot disease through appropriate drenching or foliar spray with recommended pesticides.
Control aphids with Neem-based pesticide followed by chemical insecticides.
Manage Fruit rot and Die back disease through timely fungicide sprays.
Control Alternaria Leaf Spot disease using recommended fungicides.
Manage Purple Blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight with appropriate fungicides at regular intervals.
Manage mango hoppers by spraying recommended insecticides at specific stages.
Prevent Powdery mildew infestation by spraying preventive fungicides.
Ensure Foot and mouth disease vaccination for cattle.
Vaccinate chicks against Sleeping disease using specific vaccines.
